title: Stephen Ross Says Offers for Miami Dolphins Are Close to $15 Billion
description: Stephen Ross, CEO and chair of Related Ross, founder of Related Companies and owner of the Miami Dolphins, comments on the future ownership of the Dolphins and says the offers for the franchise have reached close to $15 billion during a Bloomberg Newsmakers event with Caroline Gage. (Source: Bloomberg)
